name: Space Scavenging
description:
Steal as many space boxes as possible, but be carefull your boat is quite unstable !

Space bare or (A) on gamepad to jump then shoot.

X or (X) on gamepad  to leave with your booty.

Blue box = 1

Yellow box = 2

Red box = danger

Music for Puzzle Games (Free), by Aural Space

Thanx to Candice for the help :)
